com.davidbracewell.collection.counter

Interface Counter<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Component type being counted.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Copyable<Counter<T>>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ForwardingCounter, HashMapCounter

    public interface Counter<T>
extends Copyable<Counter<T>>

    A specialized object to double map that allows basic statistics over the objects and their values.

    Author:
    David B. Bracewell

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods
